Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: This is an initial release. Included functionality: - 1D artificial neural network (ANN) models: - definition of approximated function - specification of number of sampling points - specification of training parameters - run training - plot results - 2D ANN models
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: .NET or Mono, Windows Vista or later, Linux

English.Keywords: artificial neural networks, ANN, freeware, ANN modeling, statistics, mathematics, education, IGLib, .NET
English.Char_Desc_80: A doftware for ANN modeling and visualization based on IGLib.
English.Char_Desc_250: Software for creation of artificial neural networks-based approximation models with visualization, based on IGLib.
English.Char_Desc_450: Software for creation and visualization of artificial neural networks (ANN) - based models, based on IGLib. User can select modeled function of one or two variables, sample the function in selected number of points, create an ANN-based approximation of the chosen function, and visualize the results. Further info: http://www2.arnes.si/~ljc3m2/igor/software/AnnApp/AnnApPar.html http://www2.arnes.si/~ljc3m2/igor/iglib/
English.Char_Desc_2000: NeurApp is a software for creation and visualization of artificial neural network (ANN) - based models, based on IGLib. User can select modeled function of one or two variables, sample the function in selected number of points, create an ANN-based approximation of the chosen function, and visualize the results. Software is designed in such a way that its user can efficiently play with training parameters when building the approximation model and immediately check the effect of modified parameters on the results. Various error measures are computed immediately in order to compare effect of various ANN architectures and training parameters on performance (time efficiency and accuracy). At the same time, complexity of the approximated function and number and distribution of sampled points can easily be changes and effect readily checked. This enables user to develop a good intuition about how ANN-based models work, which are their limitations, and which are model features that are more difficult to be approximated by ANN-based models. Further info: http://www2.arnes.si/~ljc3m2/igor/software/AnnApp/AnnApPar.html http://www2.arnes.si/~ljc3m2/igor/iglib/
